title: iOMEGA Paired Data Platform
description: This is the JSON schema for paired genomic / metabolomic data

submitter_name.title: Name of contact for correspondence
submitter_name.description: This person will be the point of contact for any communication related to this entry.

submitter_institution.title: Academic institution or company name
submitter_institution.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English. E.g., 'Harvard University'.

PI_name.title: Name of the principal investigator of the submitter
PI_name.description: This person is contacted in case the submitter has moved institution

PI_institution.title: Academic institution or company name
PI_institution.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English. E.g., 'Harvard University'.

metabolomics.title: Overall metabolomics project details
metabolomics.description: Please provide basic information on the publicly available metabolomics project from which paired data is available. Currently, we allow for links to mass spectrometry data deposited in GNPS-MaSSIVE.

GNPSMassIVE_ID.title: GNPS-MassIVE identifier
GNPSMassIVE_ID.description: Please provide the GNPS-MassIVE identifier of your metabolomics data set, e.g., MSV000078839.

MaSSIVE_URL.title: Link to MassIVE upload
MaSSIVE_URL.description: Please provide the link to the MassIVE upload, e.g., https://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/result.jsp?task=a507232a787243a5afd69a6c6fa1e508&view=advanced_view.

publications.title: Key publications
publications.description: Publications describing the metabolomics experiment and samples. Please input PubMed IDs (PMIDs, not PMCIDs!), separated by commas: e.g., '12000953,8843436'. Only enter numeric characters and commas. If a PMID is not available, a DOI can be entered instead (without the designation 'DOI' itself, e.g. '10.1039/c4sc01927j')

molecular_network.title: Molecular Network Task ID
molecular_network.description: If you have run a Molecular Network on GNPS, please provide the task ID of the Molecular Network job. It can be found in the URL of the Molecular Networking job, e.g., in https://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/status.jsp?task=c36f90ba29fe44c18e96db802de0c6b9 the task ID is c36f90ba29fe44c18e96db802de0c6b9 (optional).

genomes.title: All metagenome/genomes
genomes.description: Please add all genomes and/or metagenomes for which paired data is available as separate entries.

genome_ID.title: Genome or Metagenome
genome_ID.description: Please select genome (microbial isolate grown in pure culture), metagenome (microbial mixture or environmental sample), or metagenome-assembled genome (genome assembled from a metagenome with no isolate grown in culture).

GenBank_accession.title: GenBank accession number
GenBank_accession.description: If the publicly available genome got a GenBank accession number assigned, e.g., AL645882, please provide it here. The genome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/DDBJ (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out. In case of a whole genome sequence, please use master records. At least one identifier must be entered.

RefSeq_accession.title: RefSeq accession number
RefSeq_accession.description: If the publicly available genome got a RefSeq accession number assigned, e.g., NC_003888.3, please provide it here. The genome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/DDBJ (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out. In case of a whole genome sequence, please use master records.

ENA_NCBI_accession.title: ENA/NCBI accession number
ENA_NCBI_accession.description: If the publicly available metagenome got a ENA/NCBI accession number assigned, e.g., GCA_900283375, please provide it here. The metagenome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/MGnify (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out.

MGnify_accession.title: MGnify accession number
MGnify_accession.description: If the publicly available metagenome got a ENA/NCBI accession number assigned, e.g., MGYA00067671, please provide it here. The metagenome sequence must be submitted to GenBank/ENA/MGnify (and an accession number must be received) before this form can be filled out.

BioSample_accession.title: BioSample accession number
BioSample_accession.description: If publicly available metadata is available at BioSamples, please provide the BioSample accession number, e.g. SAMEA3648350, here. We encourage depositing metadata following a standardized ontology to enable proper reuse of the data (optional).

publications.title: Key publications
publications.description: Publications describing the sequencing of the genome or metagenome. Please input PubMed IDs (PMIDs, not PMCIDs!), separated by commas: e.g., '12000953,8843436'. Only enter numeric characters and commas. If a PMID is not available, a DOI can be entered instead (without the designation 'DOI' itself, e.g. '10.1039/c4sc01927j')

experimental.title: Metabolomics experimental details
experimental.description: Please provide basic information about the Sample Preparation, Extraction Methods, and Instrumentation Methods used. If different Sample Preparation, Extraction Methods, and/or Instrumentation Methods were used leading to different metabolomics data, please use separate entries for each experimental change and create a label that will help you recall the experimental parameters during the linking step.

sample_preparation.title: Sample Growth Conditions
sample_preparation.description: For strains grown in culture, please fill in the first five sections. For metagenomic samples, only metagenomic source is necessary.

medium_type.title: Medium type
medium_type.description: Please select liquid or solid medium.

medium.title: Growth medium
medium.description: Please select a growth medium used in the experiment. If it is not present, please select Other and type it in.

growth_temperature.title: Growth temperature
growth_temperature.description: Please enter the temperature of growth in degrees Celsius.

growing_time.title: Growth time
growing_time.description: Please enter the length of growth time in hours (optional).

growth_phase_OD.title: Growth phase or OD
growth_phase_OD.description: Please enter the growth phase or OD if you know it (optional).

other_growth_conditions.title: Other growth conditions
other_growth_conditions.description: Please describe any other relevant or distinguishing growth conditions e.g. light 12h, dark 12h (optional). If you selected Other for growth medium, please write your growth medium here.

environment.title: Metagenome host or isolation source
environment.description: For metagenomic samples, please select the source host or isolation source. If it is not available, please write it in the metagenomic sample description below.

Other_environment.title: Name of other environment or host

metagenomic_sample_description.title: Metagenomic sample description
metagenomic_sample_description.description: Please describe your metagenomic sample preparation prior to extraction. If you answered Other in the question above, please also enter the host/isolation source here.

sample_preparation_method.title: Sample Growth Conditions Label
sample_preparation_method.description: Please assign a Sample Growth Conditions Label for this set of sample preparation details. If more than one sample growth conditions was used, please create a new Sample Growth Conditions Label for each condition by clicking on the plus.

extraction_methods.title: Extraction Methods
extraction_methods.description: Please provide basic details about the extraction solvents and procedures used.

solvents.title: Extraction solvent
solvents.description: Please select the organic solvent used to extract the sample. If your sovent is not listed, please select Other and specify the solvent. If you used multiple solvents, please select them all and indicate the ratio.

other_extraction_parameters.title: Other extraction details
other_extraction_parameters.description: Please describe any other relevant extraction methods, e.g. partitioned against water or fractionated with 20% acetonitrile. If you selected Other above, please write the extraction solvent here.

extraction_method.title: Extraction Method Label
extraction_method.description: Please assign an Extraction Method Label for this set of extraction details. If more than one extraction method was used, please create a new Extraction Method Label for each method by clicking on the plus.

instrumentation_methods.title: Instrumentation Methods
instrumentation_methods.description: Please provide basic information on the type of LCMS instrumentation and protocols used in this experiment.

instrument.title: Instrument type
instrument.description: Please select the type of LCMS instrument used. If your instrument type is not listed here, please select Other and specify.

column.title: Column details
column.description: Please select reverse or normal phase. You can add additional column details in the Other Instrumentation Information section below.

mode.title: Instrument mode
mode.description: Please select positive or negative mode.

range.title: Mass range
range.description: Please enter the mass range collected (optional).

buffering.title: Buffering
buffering.description: Did you add anything to your instrument running buffers, e.g. 0.1% formic acid (optional).

other_instrumentation.title: Other instrumentation information
other_instrumentation.description: Please enter any other relevant instrument details, e.g. collision energy. If you answered Other above, please provide instrument type here.

instrumentation_method.title: Instrumentation Method Label
instrumentation_method.description: Please assign an Instrumentation Method Label for this set of instrumentation details. If more than one LCMS instrumentation method was used, please create a new Instrumentation Method Label for each condition by clicking on the plus.

genome_metabolome_links.title: Links between genomes and metabolomics data
genome_metabolome_links.description: Create a linked pair by selecting the genome/metagenome accession number as provided earlier and subsequently sample names of and links to the metabolomics data file belonging to that genome with appropriate experimental methods.

genome_ID.title: Linked Genome/Metagenome Accession ID
genome_ID.description: Please select the Genome/Metagenome accession number to be linked to a metabolomics data file.

metabolomics_file.title: Location of metabolomics data file
metabolomics_file.description: Please provide a direct link to the metabolomics data file location, e.g., ftp://massive.ucsd.edu/MSV000078839//spectrum/R5/CNB091_R5_M.mzXML, that provides access to CNB091_R5_M.mzXML.

sample_preparation_label.title: Sample Growth Conditions
sample_preparation_label.description: Please select the Sample Growth Conditions Label for this linked dataset.

extraction_method_label.title: Extraction Method
extraction_method_label.description: Please select the Extraction Method Label for this linked dataset

instrumentation_method_label.title: Instrumentation Method
instrumentation_method_label.description: Please select the Instrumentation Method Label for this linked dataset

BGC_MS2_links.title: Linked gene clusters and MS2 spectra.
BGC_MS2_links.description: If you already know of a gene cluster or gene cluster family that can be linked to a molecule or molecular family, please provide details in this section

known_link.title: Known linked gene cluster and molecule
known_link.description: Please provide a brief description of the known linked molecule(s) and gene cluster(s), including the name of the molecule(s).

verification.title: Link verification
verification.description: Please indicate if verification of the link between BGC and MS2 is experimentally validated or bioinformatically inferred.

enum: Experimentally validated with knockouts, heterologous expression, or other gene cluster manipulation
Bioinformatically inferred through comparative analysis with another experimentally defined gene cluster
Experimentally validated with NMR and/or detailed MS/MS analysis

SMILES.title: Simplified molecular-input line-entry system (SMILES)
SMILES.description: Please provide the SMILES notation for the known molecule.

IUPAC.title: International union of pure and applied chemistry (IUPAC) name
IUPAC.description: Please provide the IUPAC name for the known molecule,

enum: MIBiG number associated with this exact BGC
MIBiG number of a similar BGC from a closely related strain
BGC.default: MIBiG number associated with this exact BGC

enum: MIBiG number associated with this exact BGC
MIBiG number of a similar BGC from a closely related strain

strain.title: Strain accession number
strain.description: Please provide the strain accession number of the genome containing the similar BGC.

coordinates.title: BGC Coordinates
coordinates.description: Please provide the beginning and end coordinates of the similar BGC from the genome specified above.

link.title: What would you like to link?

network_nodes_URL.title: GNPS network nodes URL
network_nodes_URL.description: Please provide the URL from GNPS for the network nodes page: first click 'View Spectral Families (In Browser Network Visualizer)' and then click 'Network Nodes' and copy this URL, e.g. https://gnps.ucsd.edu/ProteoSAFe/result.jsp?view=cluster_info_sliced&componentindex=290&show=true&task=c36f90ba29fe44c18e96db802de0c6b9#%7B%7D

MS2_URL.title: MS2 URL
MS2_URL.description: Please provide the URL for the mass spectrum with the molecule to link.

MS2_scan.title: MS2 scan number
MS2_scan.description: Please provide the MS2 scan number for the molecule to link.
